content:
# The Stone Furnace is now successfully fueled and working, with 9 Iron Ore being processed into Iron Plates. 
# My inventory has been updated accordingly, showing that I now have 10 Iron Ore left after inserting 10 into the furnace.

# The furnace is currently in a working state, which means it will produce Iron Plates over time. 
# I should monitor the furnace to ensure it produces the expected output.

# I will wait for a moment to allow the furnace to complete the smelting process and then check the output inventory of the furnace.

# Waiting for a short duration to allow smelting to occur.
sleep(5)  # Wait for 5 seconds to let the furnace work.

# After waiting, I will check the output inventory of the Stone Furnace to see how many Iron Plates have been produced.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace)  # Inspect the inventory of the Stone Furnace.
print(f"Furnace output inventory: {furnace_inventory}")  # Display the output inventory of the furnace.
